name: Welcome to the Tinderbox Games Club Awards!
name_original: Welcome to the Tinderbox Games Club Awards!
description:
Welcome to the Tinderbox Games Club Awards!
for the Tinderbox Online Games Club

A game made using Bitsy to celebrate the work of our fantastic Tinderbox Games Club crew!

To see the games made by the young people visit these links:

The first part of the game is text-based - link here.    

If you explore the right places you may also be asked to visit the visual game - link here.  

Well done to the crew for all their excellent work, and many thanks to our Tinderbox Lab Assistant Dominika Jackowska for making this brilliant Awards game.

For more information about Tinderbox and our Games Club click here.
